name: Classic Matcha Latte
description: Smooth and creamy matcha latte made with premium Japanese green tea.

name: Iced Matcha Frappe
description: A refreshing iced blend of matcha, milk, and sweetness to cool your day.

name: Matcha Lemon Spark
description: A zesty fusion of lemon and matcha with a sparkling twist.

name: Vanilla Matcha Cloud
description: Fluffy vanilla foam over warm matcha goodness — like drinking a cloud.

name: Hojicha Harmony
description: Roasted green tea latte with a nutty, soothing aroma — the perfect comfort cup.
